text: was a Japanese samurai of the Sengoku period who served the Imagawa clan. He was the son of Ii Naohira. == Life == Ii was loyal to Tōtōmi, but he and his father served the daimyō Imagawa Yoshimoto. == References == Category:Samurai Category:Year of birth unknown Category:1545 deaths Category:Ii clan
title: Ii Naoyoshi
